message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $90. This is a one-time offer, so don't miss out!

Thank you for the offer, Alice! I appreciate your enthusiasm.  $90 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now.  Would you be willing to do $85?  I'm very interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I understand that $85 is a bit of a stretch for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $87.50, which is the best I can do. Let me know if that works for you!
